confirmed_task:
1. Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/  
Test Assertions: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible. 

2. Enter "bike" in the Keyword search field 
Test Assertions: The keyword "bike" is entered in the search field. 

3. Click on the "Search" button. 
Test Assertions: The search results page is displayed, showing listings containing the keyword "bike" in the title or description. 

4. Verify the total number of listings found is displayed. 
Test Assertions: The total number of listings found is 2562 on the results page 

5. Sort the search results by "Lower price first" 
Test Assertions: The listings are reordered, with the lowest-priced items appearing at the top. 

6. Verify that each listing shows a title, thumbnail image, price, location, and date posted. 
Test Assertions: All listings contain these details in the grid view.

1. Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/  
Test Assertions: The homepage is displayed with the search field and category dropdown visible. 

2. Enter "speaker" in the Keyword search field. 
Test Assertions: The keyword "speaker" is entered in the search field. 

3. Select "Musical instruments" from the Category dropdown. 
Test Assertions: The category "Musical instruments" is selected from the dropdown menu. 

4. Click on the "Search" button. 
Test Assertions: The search results page is displayed, showing listings that match both the keyword "speaker" and the "Musical instruments" category. 

5. Enter $200 in the Minimum Price field and $500 in the Maximum Price field. 
Test Assertions: The price range $200-$500 is entered in the price filter fields. 

6. Click on the "Apply" button to filter results by price. 
Test Assertions: The search results are filtered to show only listings with prices between $200 and $500. 

7. Verify that the filtered listings match the selected keyword, category, and price range. 
Test Assertions: Only listings with prices within the specified range and matching the keyword and category are displayed.

1. Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", check "Remember me", click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Enter "camera" in keyword field, select "Photo + video" category, click "Search" 
Test Assertions: Search results page loads with camera listings 

5. Choose "Rochester (Pennsylvania)" from location dropdown, click "Apply" 
Test Assertions: Search results update to show camera listings in Rochester, Pennsylvania 

6. Click on "Camera - Revere 8 mm" listing on the top of the list 
Test Assertions: Detailed listing page opens showing item specifics, price ($20.00), and seller information 

7. Scroll to comment section, enter title "Nice camera" and comment "Nice product", click "Send" 
Test Assertions: Comment submission successful, confirmation message appears 

8. Look for comment approval notification 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your comment has been approved" 

9. Scroll through listing page to check if your comment is visible 
Test Assertions: A comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivan" is visible 

10. Delete the comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivant" 
Test Assertions: Comment list is empty

1. Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", check "Remember me", click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Enter "camera" in keyword field, select "Photo + video" category, then click "Search" 
Test Assertions: Search results page loads with Photo + video listings 

5. Enter "Falls Church" in City field, then click "Apply" 
Test Assertions: Search results page loads with Photo + video Falls Church listings 

6. Click on "Nikon N50 Camera" in the listing  
Test Assertions: Detailed listing page opens showing item specifics, price ($30.00), and seller information 

7. Scroll to comment section, enter title "Nice camera" and comment "Nice product", click "Send" 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your comment has been approved" 

8. Scroll through listing page to check if your comment is visible 
Test Assertions: A comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivan" is visible 

9. Delete the comment "Nice camera by Blake Sullivant" 
Test Assertions: Comment list is empty

1. Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", then click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Click "Publish Ad" 
Test Assertions: The “Publish a listing” page appears. 

5. Select "Bikes" in the Caterory dropdown. 
Test Assertions: Bikes category is selected. 

6. Enter "Motobecane all Carbon Fiber Shimano GRX equipped gravel bike" in the Title field 
Test Assertions:  

7. Enter "Selling my gorgeous Motobecane Carbon Fiber gravel bike equipped with 1 x 11 Shimano GRX gravel group." in the Description field 
Test Assertions:  

8. Set price at 1,495.00 
Test Assertions: The price is visible at 1,495.00
 

9. Select "California" in the Region dropdown 
Test Assertions: California is selected as region 

10. Select "San Francisco" in the City dropdown 
Test Assertions: San Francisco is selected as city 

11. Click on the "Submit" button 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your listing has been published" and the new add is visible with two buttons "Edit item" and "Delete" 

12. Click on the "Delete" button visible on the add 
Test Assertions: A pop-up window appears  

13. Click on the "OK" button in the pop-up 
Test Assertions: Green notification bar appears stating "Your listing has been published" and "My listings" page is displayed without the deleted add.

1. Start on the Homepage: http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/  
Test Assertions: Home page OsClass loads with search bar, category dropdown, and "Login" option visible 

2. Click "Login" button 
Test Assertions: Login page appears with email and password fields 

3. Enter email "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and password "Password.123", then click "Log in" 
Test Assertions: User is logged in, homepage reloads with "My account" and "Logout" options visible 

4. Click "Publish Ad" 
Test Assertions: The “Publish a listing” page appears. 

5. Select "Bikes" in the Caterory dropdonw. 
Test Assertions: Bikes category is selected. 

6. Enter "Motobecane all Carbon Fiber Shimano GRX equipped gravel bike" in the Title field 
Test Assertions:  

7. Enter "Selling my gorgeous Motobecane Carbon Fiber gravel bike equipped with 1 x 11 Shimano GRX gravel group." in the Description field 
Test Assertions:  

8. Click on "Click or Drop for upload images" button, then upload the picture given in the next step 
Test Assertions: The loaded picture is visible 

9. Select "California" in the Region dropdown 
Test Assertions: California is selected as region 

10. Select "San Francisco" in the City dropdown 
Test Assertions: San Francisco is selected as city 

11. Click on the "Submit" button

1. Open the webpage  http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/ on a half screen

2. Login with valid credentials "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" / "Password.123"

3. Enter "toyota" in the Keyword field the click on "Search" button 
Test Assertions: Results are displayed in a list 

4. Sort by higher price first in the "Sort by:" drop-down menu
 
Test Assertions: The list is ordered by advertised price: most expensive first.  

5. Observe first element 
Test Assertions: Title of the item should be displayed in blue. Price with 2 decimals should be displayed by showing US dollars symbol. 100 caracters of the descirpion should be displayed terminating with … 

6. Click on the title of the first element 
Test Assertions: The page should contain the title in the top. Then yello box should contain price aith currency USD dollars displayed
Fileds published date should be populated (date less or equal to today) Location should be displayed following the template City­, State, United States 
Description is present
Contact seller button is displayed
Share button is displayed 

7. Click on the small icon image of the right 
Test Assertions: The ad image is displayd full screen.  

8. click on the browser's back arrow to exit the image 
Test Assertions: Item description page is available. Title is same as previous 

9. Click on contact seller 
Test Assertions: Contact publisher is shown mail and name 

10. Click on share 
Test Assertions: Formulary Send to a friend is displayed 

11. Logout

1. Go to "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/" 
Test Assertions: The OsClass home page appears 

2. Select the last proposal from the search category drop-down menu, then launch the search. 
Test Assertions: The page for the chosen category appears with all the ads in "List" view. 

3. Open a new Chrome browser page 
Test Assertions: A Chrome browser page opens 

4. Go to "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/" 
Test Assertions: The OsClass home page appears 

5. In the "All categories" field, select the icon corresponding to the last proposal in the search category drop-down menu. 
Test Assertions: The page that appears is identical to that of the previous search.

1. Go to "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/" 
Test Assertions: The OsClass home page appears 

2. Select the first ad in the top right-hand corner of the "Latest listings" category 
Test Assertions: The selected product appears with the same title and price. 

3. Open a new Chrome browser page 
Test Assertions: A Chrome browser page opens 

4. 4 
Test Assertions: The OsClass home page appears 

5. In the "Keyword" field, enter the title of the ad displayed on the other open page, then launch the search. 
Test Assertions: A page appears with all ads in "List" view 

6. Apply a filter with a minimum and maximum price equal to the price of the ad displayed on the other open page. 
Test Assertions: The ad displayed on the other open page is in the updated listing

1. Go to "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/" 
Test Assertions: The OsClass home page appears 

2. Select the first proposal in the "All locations" field 
Test Assertions: The page for the chosen location appears with all the ads in "List" view. 

3. Select the first ad 
Test Assertions: The ad page appears 

4. Click on "Share 
Test Assertions: The "Send to a friend" page appears 

5. Click on "Send 
Test Assertions: An error message appears, listing all non-optional fields 

6. Complete the fields with :
Blake for Your name field
blake.sullivan@gmail.com for Your e-mail field
Joe for Friend's name
Joe.Titi@ for Friend's email address
A gift idea? for The message field
then click on "Send". 
Test Assertions: An error message stating that the friend's e-mail address is invalid appears 

7. Replace friend's email address with "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" and Send 
Test Assertions: A green message "We just sent your message to Joe" is displayed

2. Select the cheapest ad in the "Latest listings" category

1. Go to "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:9980/" 
Test Assertions: The OsClass home page appears 

2. Click on "Publish Ad 
Test Assertions: The "Publish a listing" page appears 

3. Click on "Publish" button 
Test Assertions: An error message appears with all the following fields:
- Title
- Description
- Region
- Email address
- Category 

4. Select the first proposal from the drop-down menu in the "Category" field 
Test Assertions: The error message no longer mentions the category 

5. Enter the letter R in the "Title" field 
Test Assertions: The error message only mentions that a minimum of 5 characters is required for the title. 

6. Complete the content of the "Title" field with "oman statue". 
Test Assertions: The "Title" field is identical to "Roman statue" and the error message no longer mentions the title. 

7. Enter the letter V in the "Description" field 
Test Assertions: The error message only mentions that at least 10 characters are required for the description. 

8. Write "Very beautiful statue" in the "Description" field 
Test Assertions: The error message no longer mentions the description 

9. Select the second proposal from the drop-down menu in the "Region" field 
Test Assertions: Error message no longer mentions location 

10. Write "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" for the email address 
Test Assertions: Error message disappears 

11. Publish 
Test Assertions: An error message asks you to choose a city 

12. Select the 3rd city from the drop-down menu and publish. 
Test Assertions: A message appears stating that the user is already known 

13. Enter "blake.sullivan@gmail.com" in the E-mail field and "Password.123" as the password, then attempt to connect. 
Test Assertions: The "Publish a listing" page reappears, already completed with the information entered previously, except for the email address. 

14. Publish 
Test Assertions: The ad appears in the listing 

15. Delete ad 
Test Assertions: A warning popup appears 

16. Confirm deletion 
Test Assertions: Ad disappears from listing
